text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Executive Director" means the Executive Director of the Governor's Office of Crime Control and Prevention.
"Fund" means the Law Enforcement Equipment Fund.

section.section: "Law enforcement equipment" means equipment used for law enforcement purposes.
"Law enforcement equipment" includes body armor, crime tracking technology, photo imaging equipment, surveillance devices, weapons, ammunition, and communication devices.

text.section: "Local law enforcement agency" means the agency of a county or municipal corporation in the State that performs police protection functions.
